info.summary:
Awesome Oscillator (aka Super AO) is a measure of the gap between a fast and slow period modified moving average.
See documentation for more information.
info.typeparam: Configurable Quote type. See Guide for more information.
info.param: Number of periods in the Fast moving average.
Number of periods in the Slow moving average.
info.returns: Time series of Awesome Oscillator values.
